aircraft.value: Spectre Night - AC-7720-917 at Zone-2 Facility

defect_observed.value: Actuator rod end play exceeding tolerance. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 30/05/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 02/06/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 03/06/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 05/06/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 06/06/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy
